category.name: Product Structure.PSE Display
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: PSM_set_default_rev_rule
preference.preference_description: When a product structure is opened in SM, the default rev rule specified by preference TC_config_rule_name is used to configure the product structure. If user overrides the revision rule, any new structure opened following the override, will be governed by the value set for preference PSM_set_default_rev_rule. Valid Values: * false: User defined (override) revision rule will be applied while opening structure. This is OOTB behavior. * true: Default revision rule set by preference TC_config_rule_name will be applied while opening structure.
